title: Bloomberg Markets: Invesco's Rowley on Saving for College

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Tom Rowley Director of Retirement and Education Strategies Invesco Solutions Discussing a study of 529 college savings plans.
